summary: Jujutsu is a traditional Japanese martial art, also known as jiu-jitsu or ju-jitsu. It teaches people how to fight without weapons, using their body to defend or attack. This art includes various techniques to subdue or harm opponents, even if they are armed. The term was first used by Hisamori Tenenuchi, who started the first jiu-jitsu school. Many modern martial arts, like judo and Brazilian jiu-jitsu, have roots in jujutsu.
title: Jujutsu
